It is a masquerade.—aghaemi

Title: Never Mention Murder
Synopsis: When a surgeon discovers that his wife has a lover, he plans murder.

Title: Kela Ishara Jaata Jaata
Synopsis: Ganpat plays Dholki in a Tamasha troupe of Sonabai Chiprikarin during a performance dispute arrives between the two and Ganpat leaves the group and returns to his village.Ganpat sees two sisters Shevanti and Bakula performing on streets he saves Shevanti from fire and he becomes close to the family and decides to start his own troupe with the two sisters as their father is against it Bakula and Shevanti elope with Ganpat and Bapu and start their troupe which gives them fame.Bapu plays double game on both sides and forms a drift between the sisters and Shevanti joins Sonabai's troupe.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Little Hare
Synopsis: A shy, kind and brave theatrical make-up artist refuses to put up with stupidity and cruelty of the authorities. How can anyone take a person seriously when his last name is Zajchik (Little Bunny). Everyone can manipulate and make fun of him. And Zajchik never strikes back just because he is too shy. But to the surprise of everyone love makes a lion out of little bunny.—Konstantin Dlutskii <kedlutski@mailexcite.com>

Title: Taiheiyô kiseki no sakusen: Kisuka
Synopsis: In 1943, the Aleutian island of Kiska, Alaska was fortified by a small contingent of Japanese soldiers. When word arrived of an impending attack by an overwhelming force of Americans, the Japanese Navy attempted one of the most daring and unlikely evacuations in military history. This is that story.—Jim Beaver <jumblejim@prodigy.net>

Title: Da ji qin lue zhe
Synopsis: Volunteer Army ambuscaded enemy in the Korean War.

Title: Los cuervos están de luto
Synopsis: The family of a dying man celebrates his wake while the man is still alive, showing their darker, selfish ambitions and trying to take the best part of the inheritance.

Title: Harlot
Synopsis: Jean Harlow look-alike Harlot (Mario Montez), Gerard Malanga, Philip Fagan, and Carol Koshinskie (with a cat) sit in a room eating bananas as the off-screen voices of Billy Name, Ronald Tavel, and Harry Fainlight discuss various topics.

Title: Night of Violence
Synopsis: A masked man is hunting down and murdering women throughout the city. The police set out to capture him before he can kill again.

Title: Obyknovennoe chudo
Synopsis: How difficult it is to be a real person. This was fully felt "in his own skin" by the bear, whom the wizard turned into a beautiful young man. The most terrible was the condition set by the magician. In a romantic and philosophical tale of magic and love, a mischievous Sorcerer turns a bear into a young man. Unhappy in his new state, the former bear, with the help of the magician and his beautiful wife, is looking for a princess to kiss in order for his wish to be granted. Certain that all princesses are a vain, spoiled lot, he approaches the first one he sees. But the princess herself is gentle, kind and beautiful, and she and the young man fall in love with each other at the first sight. Unable to bring her pain, he runs away without explaining. As the Princess takes brave actions to find her beloved, new characters enter the story, including the King's ambitious Prime Minister and a hunter looking for a bear fur to complete his collection. How will this complicated plot be resolved?—Asya Engelsone <annae@goshen.edu>

Title: Solange Leben in mir ist
Synopsis: The biography of the German socialistic politician Karl Liebknecht and his fight against World War I.

Title: Spy in Your Eye
Synopsis: A leading American spy has a miniature camera surgically implanted in his eye, unbeknownst to him, and with it photographs secrets for the Russians, helping them gather information about a newly created death ray.

Title: Colorado Charlie
Synopsis: Square-jawed Sheriff "Wild Bill" Danders is a heroic lawman looking to retire, and Livio Lorenzo provides the sadistic eponymous bandit whose depredations force sheriff into strapping on his gun once again.

Title: The Victor
Synopsis: Petros and Lena have known and loved each other since they were little children. But her parents oppose their relationship. Raised like brother and sister, even though they come from entirely different worlds, the chauffeur's son, Petros, and the daughter of his father's employer, Lena, have been nurturing deeper feelings for each other since childhood. However, when Lena's father decides to marry her off to a wealthy suitor, their innocent clandestine affair will come to light with unforeseen complications. Now, Petros, who is a brilliant architecture student, has to prove his worth for the sake of Lena and provide evidence that he is not after her for her money. Will love prevail?—Nick Riganas

Title: Nishan
Synopsis: Twin princes separated at birth must foil an assassination attempt and take their rightful places as rulers of a kingdom.

Title: The Falcon of the Desert
Synopsis: After years of absence, Kadir returns to his hometown Semares in the center of the Arabian desert. He finds out that the new ruler Atatur is a tyrant who leads wars merely to expand his territory. After saving the life of Atatur's general Kames in an ambush, Kadir receives the opportunity to rise to high ranks in Atatur's army. But Atatur is planning a cruel war of retribution against the desert tribes of King Hussein...—anonymous

Title: Story of a Whole Life
Synopsis: Story of a very successful singer/songwriter, enjoying night life until a daughter of an old dear friend stepped into his life and changed his life forever.

Title: Szerelmes biciklisták
Synopsis: When András, Albert and Bence are on a cycling tour around Lake Balaton, their dreams come true. Sunshine, beach and pretty girls. András and his younger brother run after the same girl, Eszter. András persuade his brother not to pinch the girl. András pick her up one night and split up with her next day. Eszter follows the boy, but András sends her away.

Title: Tokugawa Ieyasu
Synopsis: In turbulent 16th-century Japan, the leaders of a minor fief have their child taken from them as a political hostage. His mother and his clan endure years of tribulations until he can return.

Title: Denovi na iskusenie
Synopsis: In 1918, after the end of the Balkan Wars and the First World War, hundreds of Macedonians immigrated to Bulgaria. Among them there were pro-Bulgarian Macedonians who wanted to exploit the emigrants for their own political purposes. A number of decent freedom fighters were eliminated. The victim of one of the assassins in Sofia was Gjorche Petrov. His assassin is a young boy who doesn't even know that he is shooting dead the man who is one of the last real fighters for the freedom of Macedonia. By discovering that he has been unknowingly involved in the pro-Bulgarian organization and has been used for an execution of this vile act, it means the death sentence for the young boy.

Title: Komsunun tavugu
Synopsis: Türkan's lawyer suggests that the young woman make a fake marriage so that she can inherit her inheritance. Worried about taking the inheritance, Türkan tries to test the love of her ex-husband in this process.

Title: El último cartucho
Synopsis: In this old west tail everything is fine until you get to your last cartridge

Title: Panam Padaithavan
Synopsis: A family story, MGR in the role of an athlete. Nagesh his brother, goes with him to Calcutta to participate in an athletic meet. Happens to see K.R.Vijaya and fell in love but due to circumstances marry Sowcar Janaki and their marriage life is short lived, she dies horribly. Against the wishes of his father MGR marries K.R.Vijaya after a short stint in army. They have a child and how the family gets united is the remaining part of the story.—MGR Roop (srimgr.com)

Title: Muere una mujer
Synopsis: A salesman discovers that his wife has died under strange circumstances. Examining these circumstances it becomes obvious to him that they were mainly caused by himself.

Title: I Am a Fugitive from a White Slave Gang
May 13th, Night of Sorrow
Synopsis: After their mother's death, Siok-hui works different jobs to support her younger sister. When she begins working in a pharmaceutical company, she has a crush on her colleague that is passionately in love with her sister. After the death of their mother, Siok-hui sings in a nightclub to support her younger sister Siok-tshing, but her immature sister looks down on her occupation. Siok-tshing then begins working in a pharmaceutical company where she has a crush on her colleague Bun-pin. But little does she know that Bun-pin has fallen passionately in love with her sister. When she finally discovers the truth, she runs away and drowns her sorrows at a bar. There, a lascivious businessman who stalks her sister forces her to go with him to a hotel. Siok-hui rushes to the hotel, where she finds the man lying in a pool of blood.

Title: Nick Carter and Red Club
Synopsis: Nick Carter, the French counterpart of James Bond, tries to recover some stolen nuclear missiles.

Title: The Gentlemen
Synopsis: The young journalist Eveline practice an extravagant life, when it comes to the opposite sex. She has dated street smart boys and manipulative businessman. They all think they are smarter than Eveline.

Title: Skazka o Malchishe-Kibalchishe
Synopsis: While the boys are playing the magic wand, a spy-saboteur 518, sent by the bourgeoisie, appears on their land. He immediately finds an assistant among the boys - a greedy, gluttonous, cowardly and envious Malchish-Plokhish, to whom he proposes to "enroll in the bourgeoisie." Agent 518 unsuccessfully tries to find out from Malchish-Plokhish Bad Boy the Secret against the bourgeoisie. But trouble came from where they did not expect. Attacked from behind the Black Mountains by the damned Bourgeois. Bullets are already whistling again, shells are already exploding again. The peasants are fighting with the bourgeoisie and messengers are rushing to call for help from the distant Red Army... Yes, Malchish-Kibalchish rushed to their aid.—Wikipedia

Title: Un alma pura
Synopsis: Claudia, a young aristocratic girl travels to Switzerland to recover the corpse of her brother, Juan Luis. As she flies back home to Mexico, in flashback it is revealed that she and her brother had an incestuous relationship and that she managed to drive his fiancée, Claire, to her death... with tragic consequences for all of them.—Miguel Cane <Stepford@yahoo.com>

Title: Sons of the Leopard
Synopsis: Penniless Baron Tulicò, nicknamed Leopard, abandons his mistress, with whom he's had two sons, and marries a rich woman. The mistress tries to have her rights established with the help of her sons.

Title: Arshin mal alan
Synopsis: Young Askar wants to get married. He is a rich, successful businessman and has everything he could wish for expert for one thing - a wife. Tradition does not allow him to choose his own bride. But Askar has a modern mentality and wants to choose his bride himself.

Title: Yahya Peygamber
Synopsis: Depicts the life of John the Baptist. Zechariah becomes father to a son. They name him John. At the same time Mary, who is under the protection of Zechariah, gives birth to Jesus. The people think that Zechariah fathered Mary's child and kill him for it. Fearing the violence of the people, Zechariah's wife Elizabeth is forced to flee the town with their son, John. But when John the Baptist grows up, he'll return to the people to spread the word of God. Before he comes across Salome.—Ulf Kjell Gür

Title: Zoku Abashiri bangaichi
Synopsis: Tachibana has completed his three years in prison and returns to the streets. He and his old cell mate wants a new life as ex-prisoners, but by chance they come across some jewels from a bloody bank robbery.

Title: All Men Are Apes!
Synopsis: A woman in prison looks back on her wild life as a nightclub performer.

Title: Jandro
Synopsis: Asturias (Spain), 1912: Domingo Ordieres and his four sons work tirelessly in the coal mines. When they manage to save, and after the dramatic death of the father and one of the brothers in gallery eight of the mine, they decide to buy a small exploitation of low-quality coal known as The Madman's Mine. With effort and work, little by little they manage to make a small fortune thanks to the export of coal during First World War. But each brother pursues different dreams: Jandro wants to go to Paris, while Pedro is bound and determined to find coal under the sea.—jsanchez

Title: Sürtük
Synopsis: Naciye sings on the streets to live and one day she is discovered by a famous casino owner. Then Naciye falls into love with her piano teacher Cuneyt. Casino owner Ekrem starts to make a trouble.

Title: Teddy boy... agapi mou
Synopsis: A spirited saleswoman comes to the aid of a widower who wants to taste the fruits of his labours; however, his adult children--and especially his frivolous Teddy-boy son--have plans of their own about the family's substantial fortune. After decades of cruel deprivation and economic hardship, the hard-working widower and owner of a profitable hardware store, Asimakis Matsakoulis, is about to retire and taste the fruits of his labours. However, his adult children--Aris, a frivolous Teddy boy, and Lena, who is dreaming of becoming a mother--have plans of their own concerning the family's substantial fortune; aspirations that will soon come to a halt with the unforeseen arrival of the spirited young saleswoman, Zoitsa. But, who is this beautiful but meddlesome blonde newcomer who enjoys Asimakis' high approval? And what about the accomplished businessman's future? Isn't it high time he did something only for himself?—Nick Riganas

Title: Alor Pipasa
Synopsis: A mother who is a dancer by profession wants to see his son successful man in future.

Title: Fistful of Knuckles
Synopsis: Franco and Ciccio mosey into the Mexican border town of Santa Genoviefa. Both are dressed in ponchos, one rides a small mule, one a large one. They are gun salesmen, peddling their wares from town to town.

Title: The Lost Face
Synopsis: Central Europe, 1930s: Czech physician Bartos (Vlastimil Brodský) devotedly attends poor patients in the city suburbs, at the same time researching the possibilities of regeneration of human tissues after transplantation. His former colleague Rosen (Jirí Vala), now working as an assistant at the private clinic of surgeon Kirchenbruch (Martin Ruzek), considers the research a mere utopia. The disappointed Bartos, trying to verify his theories, therefore accepts the outrageous proposal of Marion (Marie Vásová), owner of a brothel - to surgically replace the face of her lover, the wanted thief Cutter (Fred Delmare), with the face of murdered Father Hopsasa (Frantisek Filipovský). Bartos is well paid but his successful operation remains a secret.—NFA.cz

Title: El perseguidor
Synopsis: The story of a saxophonist with delusions of persecution who is being destroyed little by little by means of alcohol, drugs and sex. A story by Cortázar inspired by the life of Charlie Parker, it shows a fragmented narration and remarkable formal aspects.

Title: The Real Bargain
Synopsis: The eccentric Comtesse de Saint-Plâs sells a black Citroën DS to car dealer Paul Souflé. He sells it to the young mathematics teacher Jacques Denzac who is about to marry.

Title: En ven i bolignøden
Synopsis: 7 people renting rooms in the same house get 2 weeks notice. It's impossible to find accommodation, especially for singles. One goes to the Ministry of Housing to complain and ends up as the minister's secretary. Changes follow.

Title: The Peek Snatchers
Synopsis: A pair of imbeciles discover a machine which can view anywhere remotely. They do what most low-intelligent people would; they view areas around the world where women are undressing.

Title: Six Suspects
Synopsis: When a private detective who specializes in uncovering illicit affairs turns up dead, the police must sift through an six suspects who each had a motive.

Title: Mäeküla piimamees
Synopsis: A baron gives a poor peasant a well-paid job of a milkman but for reward he has to accept his beloved girl going to mansion time to time. Does the wealth outweigh the honor and conscience?

Title: Goldsinger
Synopsis: The diabolical Goldsinger, enraged at being excluded from the UN, hatches a plot to blow up the assembly while all the heads of the state participate. Luckily, inept agent James Tont discovers the plot and sets out to stop Goldsinger.

Title: Murtaza
Synopsis: Murtaza depends on its own truth. Murtaza, a guard, is sent to a factory by his boss. He put pressure on the workers in the factory as a guard. He can not agree with the workers. His girls who workers in a same factory, make mistakes. The workers demand the punishment of their daughters.

Title: Buzlar Çözülmeden
Synopsis: After the 60 revolt, the two schizophrenics who had escaped from the mental hospital, who came from an anatolian township, lost their way from snow, explained how they managed the district governor and the gendarmerie and they managed to the township.

Title: Resume of Love Affairs
Synopsis: There has been a murder. A man is found dead in the house of a prostitute who is arrested as a suspect. But she tells of her life as a peasant, blown up and sold to a brothel by her uncle and how she gains position until she meets the dead man.—tros4500

Title: Loca juventud
Synopsis: A millionaire 's son becomes a gondolier. Johnny is a rich kid,a teenager who was born in New York City and whose daddy is a millionaire (black gold). In Italy ,he joins a pack of hoodlums ; one night they throw a party in a luxury mansion which does not belong to them!The police are here fortunately . To redeem himself (cause those bad boys and girls have damaged the beautiful trailer of his girlfriend -a good girl-) ,Johnny makes a big decision:like dad who is a self-made man ,he will work to compensate his friends for the damage.The father hires a private eye to watch over his heir.—dbdumonteil

Title: Born Under Crossed Stars
Synopsis: A young man with a strong sense of justice is torn between two girls: the flighty Taneko and the serious Suzuko.

Title: My Beloved Teacher
Synopsis: The story of students who fell in love with their teachers.

Title: Aasai Mugam
Synopsis: Manohar's life goes haywire when his father's enemies plan on stealing his father's wealth by hiring a lookalike of Manohar to carry out their plan. n the Tamil Country of the 60s... Because Ponniyam Kodhi, a marriage broker feels deceiving on his commission by Bhavani Amma (C. K. Saraswathy), the mother of Selvy (B. Saroja Devi) whom she is soon going to marry to a strong good match, attractive Manogaran (MGR), only son of big family, that of Siva Shankaran Pulai (K. D. Santhanam), an immense landowner, the matchmaker, out of revenge, damages the engagement ! At the same moment, somewhere else, a gang led by Varada (M. N. Nambiar), the ex-manager of Siva Shankaran Pulai's domains plans with his walk-on Vâdjaravel (S. V. Ramadoss), to appropriate all the fortune of its former boss, by usurping the identity of his son and more exactly the beautiful face of Manogaran ! The affair is facilitated by a mysterious doctor and in a machine of its invention! Entrainer by greed, Vâdjaravel volunteers to undergo an operation of plastic surgery to look like his victim (Manogaran).—Avinash

Title: Muhômatsu no isshô
Synopsis: A poor rickshaw driver finds himself helping a young woman and her son after the woman's husband dies suddenly.

Title: Empty Dream
Synopsis: A young man and a woman come to know each other while at the dentists's office. They are put under anesthesia and in the unconsciousness they fall in a love triangle with the dentist as if in a dream. In the extremity of happiness and misfortune, they experience the transcendence of time and space and are able to fulfill their lust. As a result, the affair is completely ruined. Wailing in great regret, they at last come to consciousness and reality.—Film Fan

Title: Calle P.
Synopsis: Calle Parking has invented a car that can be folded to the size of a suitcase. To remedy the parking problems in Stockholm. Presenting his idea to the authorities causes a conflict of interest.

Title: Un mari à prix fixe
Synopsis: The spoiled, rich girl Bérénice became infatuated with a winter sports friend whom she wanted to marry. His friends then decide, to mount a hoax: a false marriage after which the guy flees.

Title: Anna, My Darling
Synopsis: The divorced Anna works as a dance teacher in Gothenburg. She starts a relationship with one of her students, Erik.

Title: Left Handed Johnny West
Synopsis: Lone gunman Johnny West and his dog fall foul of bad men who have designs on a gold mine. After having his gun hand crushed, Johnny is joined by 2 feuding ex-boxers and their explosive expert sidekick as they all take on the villains.

Title: Pantalon Bankasi
Synopsis: A funny story about a poor guy who comes to Istanbul from his village with high hopes of getting rich. Hüdaverdi is a poor man who wishes that money was born in his pants - and soon sees his wish fulfilled.Is it a dream? No, because each time he puts his hand into his pocket, a large bill comes out of it, and many in succession, too. His life changes, and after profiting from some pricey things he couldn't afford before, he shares his luck with his three best friends and with Eylul, a good girl who likes him, but he is too shy to ask in marriage.Hüdaverdi opens a bank - to distribute money, instead of collecting deposits. He helps people in need who come to his bank, and also tricksters of all sorts. A white collar gang insinuated themselves as Hüdaverdi's associates, and set Ayse, a cabaret singer and dancer, to take the simpleton to bed - in order to take the magic trousers from him.«Nightclub Ideal's star singer met Mr. Hüdaverdi, president of the Pants Bank.» The newspaper title is topped by a photograph of him kissing Ayse, which the gang had obtained in a set-up the day before, in order to compromise him. Eylül reads the newspaper and is jealous of her neighbor.The man has to walk home from Ayse's apartment in his underpants, his modesty saved by his friends who serve as bodyguards.Meanwhile, Ayse takes the magic trousers to the gang, and the men try the trousers on, but with no results. Ayse returns the trousers to Hüdaverdi, who took refuge at the bank. He puts them on, and as soon as he puts his hand in the pocket, a new bill comes out. The gangsters come out of their hiding, knock him out, and abduct him, and the trousers.A fight starts among the gangsters out of greed, and one of them is knocked out. Ayse - in a black patterned shirt and a gray skirt - leaves the office with the magic trousers. Waiting for her is Eylül - in a light patterned dress - who attacks her, and they fight for a long moment, their screeches heard at the office next door, where the gangsters kept on arguing. The men finally come to Ayse's rescue, and take the magic pants back again.Eylül unties the man. Hüdaverdi wishes to leave, but with trousers on, so he has to "borrow" a pair from the knocked-out gangster. The couple leaves the office, and comes back with Hüdaverdi's friends to recuperate the trousers - but they arrive too late. The gang is watching the magic trousers burn on the pavement - they had set it on fire, as it was no good for them.The couple and their friends are saddened by this, and Hüdaverdi even sheds some tears. His hand goes automatically to the trousers' pocket for a handkerchief - and instead of one, he sorts a bank note, and another, and another...

Title: The Sound of Buwisit
Synopsis: The wackiest sound in all the world.

Title: Se non avessi più te
Synopsis: A young singer secretly gets married since he does not want to let his fans down. After a while the gutter press make up a love story which seriously worries his young bride.

Title: My Home Is Copacabana
Synopsis: Jorginho, his white friend Rico, Lici and Paulinho are homeless best friends living in a slum in a hill in Copacabana. They spend their hopeless life playing with kite; trying to survive getting food from the street market or the fishermen; learning how to pickpocket; working on the streets polishing shoes. Rico escaped from an institution in Caxambu that symbolizes hell on Earth for them. When he gets ill, he decides to return to the place because he does not want to die on the streets.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Title: Censored
Synopsis: Promises to show exactly what was cut 'n' banned from several films in Barry Mahon's vast arsenal.

Title: Seashore Village
Synopsis: At an ocean side village, many fishing boats never return from the high sea, and many of the women in the village assume they are widows when their husbands never return. One of them, Seongku, begins an affair with a coal worker.

Title: Kiri no hata
Synopsis: Kiriko attempts to hire a well-known lawyer to defend her brother's murder case. The lawyer turns Kiriko down as she cannot afford him. Some time later, Kiriko encounters the lawyer again, but this time it is he who needs her help.

Title: Secuestro en la ciudad
Synopsis: A girl, the daughter of a wealthy businessman, is kidnapped by a man and taken to a country house to await the collection of the ransom. But several unforeseen events complicate the kidnapper's plans.

Title: St. Pauli Herbertstraße
Synopsis: After being raped, a farmer's daughter, rejected by her parents, ends up with pimps and whores in a brothel until an honest car mechanic frees her.

Title: There Lived an Old Man and an Old Woman
Synopsis: The old parents are trying to arrange the life of their miserable daughter. An elderly veterinary assistant in a small Ukrainian town, Grinia, married to Natalia (he calls 'the old woman'), leaves his isba which has been destroyed by fire. The old couple choose to go to Siberia and move in with their daughter Nina rather than to settle down in Caucasus with their more balanced son. They are welcomed by Ivan, their son-in-law, a man ravaged by alcohol that his wife has left to live with a married man. Grinia and Natalia stay mainly to bring up Irena, their granddaughter. They soon become friends with the local miners and help Ivan get his feet back on the ground. The reformed drunkard falls in love with Galya, his young neighbor but, to his distress, Nina reappears, broken but cynical, after being dumped by her lover. Her parents side with Ivan and kick her out of home...—Guy Bellinger

Title: Per un dollaro a Tucson si muore
Synopsis: A gang of outlaws takes domination of Tucson Arizona to anticipate for the arrival of a shipment of gold, with only a coalition of volunteer soldiers trying to fight them and recover the town.

Title: To Come and Stay
Synopsis: Three villagers try their luck in the big city.

Title: Provereno nema mina
Synopsis: On October 20, 1944, Belgrade was liberated by the Red Army and Tito's partisans. But the capital of Yugoslavia is still fraught with danger--a retreating aggressor has mined the city . A special partisan squad goes into an underground maze of tunnels to find and disarm explosives which are still guarded by SS special forces.—jeremiah59, Croatia

Title: Me vkhedav mzes
Synopsis: Khatia, a blind girl, sees only sunlight. Zurikela, young orphan boy, helps Khatia to have a normal life. Action takes place in Georgia during world war two. Zurikela, orphan boy. Meets Khatia, blind girl, who wants to return eye-sight. Zurikela decides to help her. They know, that if blind sees the sunlight, her sight can be recovered. They both face obstacles and poverty, because of war. At one point Zurikela thinks to leave Khatia and have his own life. However, conscience doesn't allow him to do it.—Nodar Dumbadze

Title: Currito de la Cruz
Synopsis: About the rivalry between the old bullfighter Manolo Carmona and young Romerita and his seduction of the Carmonas' daughter Rocio. After a year, Romerita leaves Rocio and their daughter, who endure many calamities.
